page.title: 08HANG GLIDING
page.content: Hang gliding began in the 1970's.At first people lost their lives in this sport.Today you don't hear of people being killed so often because people are more skilled at it.A hang glider is a metal frame to support large nylon wings and a harness to carry the pilot.The pilot can manoeuvre the glider to some extent.In Brighton,the north side of the{Devils Dyke}is favoured by most pilots in South East England. To start flying you have to catch the wind off the hill which is called the rising current.On any weekend when the weather is favourable the sky over the{Dyke}is filled with hangliders.
